channel.title: Error while trying to host
channel.description: I was trying to register my server on www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php then all in a sudden when i clicked register it said You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = 'evilpking.no-ip.org' OR `ipfield` = '68.102.224.190'' at line 1 I dont understand it can someone help me?

item.title: Error while trying to host
item.dc:creator: @the_spartan the spartan
item.description:
@the_spartan wrote:

I was trying to register my server on www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php then all in a sudden when i clicked register it said You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ’ IP= 'evilpking.no-ip.org' ORipfield` = ‘68.102.224.190’’ at line 1 I dont understand it can someone help me?

Read full topic
